locale.title: Minecraft Bedrock Edition Online Multiplayer List
locale.friend: Add me as a friend now!
setting.title: Settings
setting.joinSetting: Join Settings (Whose friend list you joined)
locale.JoinsMessage: Jump into the game and check it out!
notify.title: Announcement
notify.placeholder: Please confirm you have read the above content
notify.text1: Enter "I have read" or "我已阅读" or "我已閱讀" to continue accessing:
notify.text3: First, add the friend 'HelloMC25' in Minecraft, then stay on the 'Friends' tab (where 'Joinable Realms' and 'Joinable Friends' are displayed). Return to the webpage, click the settings button in the bottom right, select 'HelloMC25,' and then select the room. After clicking, check the operation status displayed at the bottom of the webpage. If successful, return to the game to see if the room appears.
